import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import app from "../firebase.config"; import { getAuth, signOut } from "firebase/auth"; import { getFirestore, doc, setDoc, getDoc } from "firebase/firestore"; import QRCode from "react-qr-code"; import QRImage from "react-qr-image"; import Modal from "./Modal"; import QrButon from "./QrButon"; import DeleteButon from "./DeleteButon"; import EditButon from "./EditButon"; import img from '../assets/img/fondo.png'; const auth = getAuth(app); const firestore = getFirestore(app); const Main = () => { const [modal, setmodal] = useState(false); const [modalQr, setmodalQr] = useState(null); const [Documentos, setDocumentos] = useState(null); async function obtenerDocumentos() {} const subir = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const docuRef = doc(auth, "/Documento/fzN36VIA7azaAlka8ert"); setDoc(docuRef, { docs: [ { Titulo: e.target.Titulo.value, paciente: e.target.Paciente.value }, ], }); console.log(e.target.document.value); }; function QRmodal(url) { setmodalQr(url); } useEffect(() => { //obtenerDocumentos() }, []); // console.log(Documentos) return (

logo

)}
